body_html:
I use shelve to pickle the random number generator. When restart the training, I do not use seed to recover rng and use shelve to load the rng object directly.
Then I can got the same results each time I restart the training. The script is like this.
Thus I can obtain the same random number each time.

My program is complex. I will try to give a simplified one to illustrate my issue if I am free.

with shelve.open('debug', r) as f0
   rng = f0['dataloader.rng']

da0 = dataloader.generate_data(rng)
model(da0)
blabla....

body:
I use shelve to pickle the random number generator. When restart the training, I do not use seed to recover rng and use shelve to load the rng object directly. 
Then I can got the same results each time I restart the training. The script is like this.
Thus I can obtain the same random number each time.

My program is complex. I will try to give a simplified one to illustrate my issue if I am free.

```
with shelve.open('debug', r) as f0
   rng = f0['dataloader.rng']

da0 = dataloader.generate_data(rng)
model(da0)
blabla....
